title: What are some song lyrics you can immediately recall? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wilco, Ashes of American Flags The cash machineIs blue and greenFor a hundred in twentiesAnd a small service feeI could spend three dollarsAnd sixty-three centsOn diet coca-colaAnd unlit cigarettes I wonder whyWe listen to poetsWhen nobody gives a fuckHow hot and sorrowfulThis machine begs for luckAll my lies are always wishes I know I would dieIf I could come back new I want a good lifeWith a nose for thingsA fresh wind and bright skyTo enjoy my sufferingA hole without a keyIf I break my tongueSpeaking of tomorrowHow will it ever comeAll my lies are always wishes I know I would dieIf I could come back new I'm down on my hands and kneesEvery time the doorbell ringsI shake like a toothacheWhen I hear myself singAll my lies are only wishes I know I would dieIf I could come back new I would like to saluteThe ashes of American flagsAnd all the falling leavesFilling up shopping bags

Leonard Cohen: Hallelujah David played a secret chord That he knew would please the lord But you don’t really care for music, do you It goes like this The fourth The fifth The minor chord The major lift Singing Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Your Faith was strong but you needed proof You saw her bathing on the roof Her beauty in the moonlight overthrew you She tied you to a kitchen chair She broke you throne, she cut your hair And then we started singing Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Halleluuujah
